item.description:
Where: Downright Music & Art
100 Main St # A
Collinsville, CT 06019
When: Sat Dec 12th
Time: 10-4pm

This is a group of local crafters & friends that get together to sell thier AMAZING crafts and donate 10% of their proceeds to charity.

I will be there giving Tui Na Chair sessions and having Kung Fu tea ceremony.

You will find all sorts of great stuff!
Jewelry, Paintings, Scarves, Hats, Candles, Lip Balms, Bags, Hot Sauce, Honey and so much more!

Each year we choose a charity that helps women and their families.

Last year we were able to earn over $400 for The Interval House, a charity that helps Women & Children victims of Domestic Violence.

This year we have decided to donate 10% of the proceeds to Ovarian Cancer Research.
item.name: Collinsville Charity craft fair
